column4: Can someone help me with my Xserver? It crashes right after starting it. The log is here: http://pastebin.com/s6QyX8pj
no I use a TV which is PAL
can you do "X -configure" to see whether it crashes as well
it says FATAL, nvidia not found
sounds stupid, since you don't really have nvidia card, right?
no it is a VIA thingy
but it did give a new xorg.conf, maybe it didn't crash after all?
it crashes with the new xorg.conf as well
now, can you modify the new xorg.conf to specify modelines
do you have an example so I know where and how to write the modelines?
basically, you need to add sections Monitor Screen, and in Screen, you specify modes lines: Modes "1024x768" "1280x1024"
I added some modelines, depth 24 "1024x768" "1280x1024" and now instead of X crashing, everything crashes...
had to restart the pc for anything to happen
sounds like video card driver bug though :( bad luck for openchrome users :(
